choices.C: The match refresh is dependent on data sources used in the match definition being successfully processed.
choices.B: The match refresh is dependent on all data sources being successfully processed.
choices.A: The refresh of Insights is dependent on the search refresh being successfully processed.
choices.D: The refresh of Insights is dependent on segment refreshes being successfully processed.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
answers are correct
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-insights/data/system

Selected Answer: CD
Ref: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-insights/data/system
Match: Depends on the processing of the data sources used in the match definition.
Insights: Runs manually (single time refresh). Depends on segments.

Selected Answer: CD
CD should be correct, because match process is dependent of only data sources involved in match step

Selected Answer: BC
BC is the correct answer

questions.question_text:
Your company implemented Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights as the Customer Data Platform, and you are assigned as an administrator. You monitor the status overview in the Administration section of the important product processes on a daily basis.

When the status does not show “Successful”, you must recognize the dependencies between refresh processes.

What are two of these dependencies?

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

You need to set up the refresh schedule for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights.

Which two interval periods are available? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

An organization is using Microsoft Power Query when connecting to data sources in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights.

You need to load eCommerce Contacts to Dynamics 365 Customer insights using Power Query.

Which is an appropriate action to take when using Power Query to ingest data?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct.

choices.D: You must use eCommerce contacts value m the name field when creating the data source.
choices.C: You can add additional entities to the data source using Get Data functionality in the Power Query.
choices.B: You must create a separate Power Query data source for each entity you wish to ingest.
choices.A: If a system process uses a Power Query data source, you can simultaneously edit the data source.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
Answers are correct
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-insights/data/incremental-refresh-data-sources

choices.C: The user can set up an incremental refresh for the existing data source as long as it supports incremental updates. The data is ingested through Microsoft Power Query, and the table must have fields that contain a lastupdated date and a primary key.
choices.B: Once a data source is ingested in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights it can be set up for incremental refresh if the data is being updated in the source system and can be refreshed in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights on a defined schedule.
choices.A: To set up a data source for incremental refresh in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights a user must be able to select the primary key for the table or the entities within the data source to complete configuration of the incremental refresh schedule.
choices.D: The initial refresh for a data source configured for an incremental refresh will be a full refresh. All subsequent data refreshes will only update records in Dynamics 365 Customer insights based on inserts, updates and deletes in the data source.

questions.question_text:
You are selecting the data sources for an incremental refresh.

You need to set up the incremental refresh for qualified data sources.

Which two points must you consider before doing the refresh? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.B: In Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, select and edit the eCommerce profiles data source to open the Power Query - Edit queries dialog
choices.A: In Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, select and edit eCommerce profiles' data source, select the lastupdated column select the Transform tab to change Data Type to Date, and select Save
choices.C: In Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, select and edit the eCommerce profiles entity to open the Power Query - Edit queries dialog
choices.D: In Power Query, edit the queries dialog, and select the lastupdated column, select the Transform tab, change Data Type to Date, and select Save

questions.question_text:
Your organization is using Microsoft Power Query when connecting to data sources in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights. You loaded eCommerce profiles to Dynamics 365 Customer Insights. The table contains a lastupdated field that is loaded as a text field instead of a date field.

You need to fix the column format.

Which two actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
answers are correct
